DOC.brief_summary: This is a multi-centre, single arm study to evaluate the placement of tympanostomy tubes with the AventaMed Solo Tympanostomy Tube Device (TTD)
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study of Solo Tympanostomy Tube Device (TTD)
DOC.criteria: Basic Listed for bilateral tympanostomy tube insertion only Basic Anatomy that precludes sufficient visualisation of both the left and right eardrum with the Solo TTD in place. Anatomy that precludes safe access to both the left and right eardrum with the Solo TTD Patients in whom a reliable audiogram is not possible
